'''Poisonous potato fries''' are a joke [[food]] item, added in [[24w14potato]], obtained by smelting [[poisonous potato sticks]].

== Obtaining ==
{{Smelting
|Poisonous Potato Sticks
|Poisonous Potato Fries
}}

== Usage ==
To eat poisonous potato fries, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|10}} [[hunger]] and 12 [[saturation]]. Unlike unprocessed poisonous potato, fries do not cause [[Poison]].
